<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 8"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Patron's Breadth](/Feats.aspx?ID=5103) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 222 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Archetype** [Witch](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=217)

**Prerequisites**
[Basic Witch Spellcasting](/Feats.aspx?ID=5100)

</column>

---

You can cast more spells each day. Increase the spell slots you gain from witch archetype feats by 1 for each spell rank other than your two highest spell ranks
name: Patron's Breadth
